content: quote: Amid increasing suggestions that Israel might attack Iran’s nuclear facilities, Defense Secretary Robert M. Gates warned that such a strike would have dangerous consequences and asserted that Tehran’s acquisition of a bomb could be prevented only if “Iranians themselves decide it’s too costly.” Using his strongest language on the subject to date, Gates told a group of Marine Corps students that a strike would probably delay Tehran’s nuclear program from one to three years. The attack, however, would unify Iran, “cement their determination to have a nuclear program and also build into the whole country an undying hatred of whoever hits them,” Gates said. (Los Angeles Times, April 16, 2009) Agree 100% "None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free." -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: Amid increasing suggestions that Israel might attack Iran’s nuclear facilities, Defense Secretary Robert M. Gates warned that such a strike would have dangerous consequences and asserted that Tehran’s acquisition of a bomb could be prevented only if “Iranians themselves decide it’s too costly.” Using his strongest language on the subject to date, Gates told a group of Marine Corps students that a strike would probably delay Tehran’s nuclear program from one to three years. The attack, however, would unify Iran, “cement their determination to have a nuclear program and also build into the whole country an undying hatred of whoever hits them,” Gates said. (Los Angeles Times, April 16, 2009)
reply: Agree 100% "None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free." -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
title: Gates Warns Against Israeli Strike on Iran’s Nuclear Facilities

content: Nobody is going to do a damn thing to Israel if they attack, they still have nuclear weapons and no one else in the region does. If the nuclear weapons program is only delyed 1-3 years then fine, hit them again and again until they get the damn message. If I were Israel, right now, I would be planning an attack with the full intention of carrying it out. The Iranians are using the time the Obama administration is giving them to develop the nuclear weapon they desire, lets not kid ourselves here. These are the damn Iranians we're talking about, I have Iranian money right now in my room that we took off of some scumbag in Mosul...they were killing our guys over there, they don't give a rats ass about working with us...

title: Gates Warns Against Israeli Strike on Iran’s Nuclear Facilities

content: quote: Gulf States Get Set For An Israeli Raid On Iran’s Nuclear Sites Members of the Gulf Cooperation Council—Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Qatar, Bahrain, the United Arab Emirates and Oman—are getting ready for what many now assume will be retaliation from Iran after an Israeli bombing of Iran’s nuclear facilities later this year. Up and down the Gulf, Patriot missile batteries have been quietly deployed around key oil installations. There is also a steady traffic in and out of Washington of high-ranking GCC military and defense officials, including army, air force and navy chiefs. Gulf rulers are fearful Israel’s new government, headed by the tough, uncompromising Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, will walk away from any possibility of a Palestinian solution. The Annapolis accord of 2007 for a two-state solution? Didn’t happen on our watch, says Israel’s new governing team. (Washington Times, April 17, 2009, Pg. 19) "None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free." -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
